title: #345:  'Below Deck' Just Got Liza'd!!
description:
PARALYZED! Liza Sandler from "Secrets & Wives" turned up on this week's episode of "Below Deck," and we couldn't have been happier! Come join us as we dissect everything from Sierra's use of the word "queen" to the dramatic turn of events caused by sea urchin! Plus, we take on the RHONJ reunion and the Married to Medicine premiere!

00:00:00 - Intro
00:04:43 - Crappens Mailbag
00:18:51 - Below Deck
01:02:02 - Real Housewives of New Jersey Reunion Part I
01:43:52 - Married to Medicine

author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
